about_the_game:
Enjoy the full soundtrack of Poetry in Purgatory anywhere!

These 11 tracks run the full spectrum of emotions, and serve as the perfect accompaniment to Isobel's intriguing journey through the afterlife.

All tracks composed by popular YouTube artist Endigo specifically for the game.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains mentions and interpretations of death, religion, psychological torture and sex. 

In addition, there are a few instances of male upper body nudity and explicit language.

Nothing graphic is shown, only described or implied.

short_description: After dying, poisoned for unknown reasons, Isobel finds herself in the afterlife... and on a dangerous mission. Experience a truly unique visual novel full of character, mystery and heart as you point and click your way to unveiling the strange world of Purgatory's many secrets.
